jgame.listener

Interface Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundaryRemovalListener, ButtonListener, DelayListener, FrameListener, GlobalClickListener, GlobalKeyListener, HitTestListener, LocalClickListener, LocalKeyListener, ParentBoundsListener, TimerListener

    public interface Listener
    A listener. Each listener is checked every frame, and if it is valid, then the listener will be invoked.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(GObject target, Context context)
      Invokes the listener in the specified context on the specified object.
      boolean isValid(GObject target, Context context)
      Determines whether the listener is valid and should be invoked in the given context.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(GObject target,
            Context context)
        Invokes the listener in the specified context on the specified object.
        Parameters:
        target - the target of the listener
        context - the context in which to invoke the listener

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(GObject target,
                Context context)
        Determines whether the listener is valid and should be invoked in the given context.
        Parameters:
        target - the target of the listener
        context - the context to test
        Returns:
        true if the listener should be invoked, or false if it should not
